meanings.definition: In a way that shows approval or support.
meanings.sent1: She smiled favorably at the idea presented.
meanings.sent2: The teacher looked favorably upon the student's hard work.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail favorably when given a treat.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed favorably after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The audience clapped favorably at the end of the performance.

meanings.definition: In a way that is advantageous or beneficial.
meanings.sent1: Eating vegetables can impact health favorably.
meanings.sent2: Investing wisely can lead to a favorably secure future.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred favorably after being fed its favorite food.
meanings.sent4: The sun shining favorably on the garden helped the plants grow.
meanings.sent5: Studying consistently can result in favorably improved grades.
